basic.description: Mathematical methods for describing software behaviour and structure. Topics include (but are not limited to) the following: Requirements specification. Module specification: axiomatic, algebraic, and trace specifications. Abstract models. Verification. Specification-based validation.
basic.subject: CMPE
basic.title: Formal Methods In Software Eng

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: CMPE 204 or CISC 204 and CMPE 223 or CISC 223 and CMPR 327 and registered in BSCE.
